com.hybris.cis.client.rest.subscription

Interface SubscriptionClient

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SubscriptionClientImpl, SubscriptionMockClientImpl

    public interface SubscriptionClient
    Client interface for a SubscriptionService.

      • hpfUrl

        com.hybris.commons.client.RestResponse<Void> hpfUrl(String xCisClientRef)
        Returns the vendor specific URL to the hosted payment front-end (HPF).
        Parameters:
        xCisClientRef - client ref to pass in the header
        Returns:
        the rest response

      • postSubscription

        @Deprecated
com.hybris.commons.client.RestResponse<CisSubscriptionTransactionResult> postSubscription(String xCisClientRef,
                                                                                                      CisSubscriptionOrderPostRequest subscriptionOrderRequest)
        Deprecated. As of release 5.2, use createSubscription(java.lang.String, com.hybris.cis.api.subscription.model.CisSubscriptionCreateRequest) instead
        Subscription order setup (for existing account) .
        Parameters:
        xCisClientRef - client ref to pass in the header
        subscriptionOrderRequest - the subscription order to send to the Subscription Billing Provider
        Returns:
        the rest response

      • createSubscription

        com.hybris.commons.client.RestResponse<CisSubscriptionData> createSubscription(String xCisClientRef,
                                                                               CisSubscriptionCreateRequest request)
        Creates new subscription.
        Parameters:
        xCisClientRef - client ref to pass in the header
        request - request containing the necessary details.
        Returns:
        CisSubscriptionData created subscription data

      • replaceSubscriptionPaymentMethod

        @Deprecated
com.hybris.commons.client.RestResponse<CisSubscriptionTransactionResult> replaceSubscriptionPaymentMethod(String xCisClientRef,
                                                                                                                      CisSubscriptionReplacePaymentMethodRequest replacePaymentMethodRequest)
        Deprecated. As of release 5.2, use replaceSubscriptionPaymentMethod(String, String, String, String) instead
        Replace payment method (for an existing auto bill).
        Parameters:
        xCisClientRef - client ref to pass in the header
        replacePaymentMethodRequest - the replace payment request to send to the Subscription Billing Provider
        Returns:
        the rest response

      • replaceSubscriptionPaymentMethod

        com.hybris.commons.client.RestResponse<CisSubscriptionData> replaceSubscriptionPaymentMethod(String xCisClientRef,
                                                                                             String merchantSubscriptionId,
                                                                                             String merchantPaymentMethodId,
                                                                                             String effectiveFrom)
        Replaces the payment method for an existing subscription.
        Parameters:
        xCisClientRef - client ref to pass in the header
        merchantSubscriptionId - id of the subscription to update.
        merchantPaymentMethodId - id of the new payment method
        effectiveFrom - indicates when the replacement should take effect (implementation specific)
        Returns:
        the updated subscription

      • initializeTransaction

        com.hybris.commons.client.RestResponse<CisSubscriptionTransactionResult> initializeTransaction(String xCisClientRef,
                                                                                               CisSubscriptionSessionInitRequest subscriptionSessionInitRequest)
        Initialize a HOA/SilentOrderPost transaction.
        Parameters:
        xCisClientRef - client ref to pass in the header
        subscriptionSessionInitRequest - contains data for initialization and the subscription order (without PCI data) to send to the Subscription Billing Provider
        Returns:
        the rest response

      • finalizeTransaction

        com.hybris.commons.client.RestResponse<CisSubscriptionTransactionResult> finalizeTransaction(String xCisClientRef,
                                                                                             CisSubscriptionSessionFinalizeRequest subscriptionSessionFinalizeRequest)
        Finalize a HOA/SilentOrderPost transaction.
        Parameters:
        xCisClientRef - client ref to pass in the header
        subscriptionSessionFinalizeRequest - includes the id/token for an active transaction session to be finalized
        Returns:
        the rest response

      • cancelSubscription

        com.hybris.commons.client.RestResponse<CisSubscriptionData> cancelSubscription(String xCisClientRef,
                                                                               String merchantSubscriptionId,
                                                                               String effectiveFrom)
        Cancels an existing subscription.
        Parameters:
        xCisClientRef - client ref to pass in the header
        merchantSubscriptionId - id of the subscription to cancel
        effectiveFrom - indicates when to cancel the subscription (implementation specific)
        Returns:
        the cancelled subscription

      • getBillingActivityList

        com.hybris.commons.client.RestResponse<CisSubscriptionBillingActivityList> getBillingActivityList(String xCisClientRef,
                                                                                                  String merchantSubscriptionId,
                                                                                                  Date fromDate,
                                                                                                  Date toDate)
        Returns a billing activity list for a subscription.
        Parameters:
        xCisClientRef - client ref to pass in the header
        merchantSubscriptionId - id of the subscription to get billing activities for
        fromDate - 'from' date to filter by
        toDate - 'to' date to filter by
        Returns:
        the rest response
